import { useState } from "react"; const FormCalculator = props => { const [currentSavings, setCurrentSavings] = useState(0); const [yearlySavings, setYearlySavings] = useState(0); const [expectedInterest, setExpectedInterest] = useState(0); const [investmentDuration, setInvestmentduration] = useState(0); const CurrentSavingsHandler = (e) => { setCurrentSavings(e.target.value); } return(

) } export default FormCalculator;
